name: The Intergalactic Web
description:
Welcome this was a game that was very stressful to make. So I hope you enjoy.

Story 

You are part of the space troopers.  Your job is to save the crumbling galactical web. Gather all the stars and put the universe back together.

Controls

Keyboard is

Move Up with W,  or Up Arrow Key

Move Down with S,  and Down Arrow Key,

Restart with R

Controller

Move Up with Left Joy Stick pushing Up, and D-pad Up

Move Left with Left Joy Stick pushing Down, and D-pad Down

GOAL

Live as long as you can collect as much fuel and stars as possible

Simple Tips

BE CAREFUL

Play the Windows or Linux Version since html can be worse depending on your computer
